directions: Mix baby salad greens, pecans, dried cherries, and Parmesan cheese in a large bowl. Drizzle vinaigrette over the salad; toss to coat evenly.
ingredients: 1 1/2 (16 ounce) packages mixed baby salad greens
1/2 cup balsamic vinaigrette salad dressing, or to taste
title: Quick Christmas Salad
